result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. William Howard Duvall III

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.

Defendant William Howard Duvall III appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for William Howard Duvall III.  Attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Parties are still negotiating and requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 11-10-22 at 8:30 am for status conference, by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant William Howard Duvall III appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for William Howard Duvall III.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense has discovery but does not have an offer.  Case is adjourned to 10-12-22 at 8:30 am for a status conference by zoom. 
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with RDB.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court, defendant William Howard Duvall not in court, in custody.  Julie Ann Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for a bail review.  Arguments heard. Court denied defense request for a bail review.  Case is adjourned to 9-15-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant William Howard Duvall in court with Attorney Andrew Golden for Attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense needs discovery and an offer. Defense is requesting a bail review hearing.  Case is adjourned to 8-17-22 at 8:30 am for bail review hearing.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Oral No Contact Order with RDB

Defendant William Howard Duvall in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Defendant William Howard Duvall in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  William Howard Duvall appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
